be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.Geometric
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.Meshable
        • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selectionable

    public class Item
extends Meshable
implements Selectionable
    An Item is an instance of an object in the 3D world. For example, the Entity "Lamp" could be instanciated multiple times as different items
    Author:
    brochape
